akn:section.akn:heading: Registry for lead exposure and Advisory Committee

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Lead exposure registry The Secretary shall establish within the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry or the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention at the discretion of the Secretary, or establish through a grant award or contract, a lead exposure registry to collect data on the lead exposure of residents of a City on a voluntary basis.
